title: Lack of barriers leads to zero LR economic profit

content.question: The characteristic that causes firms in a perfectly competitive industry to earn zero economic profits in the long run is

choices.label: individual firms account for a small fraction of the total market
the industry supply curve is horizontal
there are no barriers to entry or exit

content.answer: there are no barriers to entry or exit
